Asset.Name: Refrigeration
Asset.Description: Refrigeration is the process of removing heat from an enclosed space or from a substance. The primary purpose for refrigeration has always been to preserve food, with air conditioning a strong second in developed nations in the latter decades of the 20th century.
Asset.Quote: "And homeless near a thousand homes I stood, and near a thousand tables pined and wanted food." - William Wordsworth
Asset.Notes: Allows you to build the Submarine, a ship invisible to all units except Destroyers and other Submarines.
